author: markphip
msg: JavaHL: Add numberChilder param to JavaDoc

author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Add a "number of children" parameter to the LogMessageCallback
(singleMessage): Pass nbr_children to the Java singleMessage method.
match the changes to the interface.

author: hwright
msg: Add another test scenario to the merge sensitive log test.
(merge_sensitive_log_single_revision): Also check log output on a branch.

author: dlr
msg: A follow-up to r25326, fixing a bug in svn_mergeinfo_diff()'s new
ability to accept NULL merge info inputs, and propagating use of this
new ability to 'diff' of the "svn:mergeinfo" property.
(svn_mergeinfo_diff): Fix assignment of *ADDED hash to copy TO
(display_mergeinfo_diff): Avoid allocating old/new merge info hashes.
